house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1995 has 5 bedroom(s), 4 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 4367 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room. Features include view, private pool, private spa, air conditioning, french doors.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, French Doors, Ocean Access, Outdoor Grill, Pantry
